name: Sadworm
description:
Overcome your sadness and depressing thoughts by climbing up to the top of the mountains. 

Physics based game, where you control a worm. 

Made live on Twitch, for the GOTM.io jam #11 with the theme "Up, Up and Away". 

Controls

The game is best played with a controller!

Controller
  • Left stick controls the tail
  • Right stick controls the head
  • Start to pause
  • R2 to peak while paused (keep pause but remove the UI to see the world)
Keyboard
  • WASD to control the tail
  • IJKL to control the head
  • SHIFT to peak while paused (keep pause but remove the UI to see the world)
